ModMetaData.name: Configurable Work Speeds
ModMetaData.author: Corners
ModMetaData.description:
Configurable Work Speeds lets you adjust multipliers for all major work speed-related stats in RimWorld and compatible mods. - Supports RimWorld 1.6 and HugsLib (required) - Optional live configuration via UINotIncluded - Automatically detects and supports custom work speed StatDefs from other mods in most cases. - If you want to add custom work speed StatDefs, see the extension point below. - This mod is open source and available on GitHub: https://github.com/Corners/ConfigurableWorkSpeeds - This is my first mod, so please report any issues or suggestions!
Logging: This mod logs important events, stat detection, and multiplier changes to RimWorld's log file. You can view these messages in the in-game log window (press Ctrl+F12) or by checking the log file at: /RimWorldWin64_data/output_log.txt (Windows) This helps with troubleshooting, tracking how multipliers are applied and could point to potential reasons for crashes.
Extension Point: Other mods can add new StatDefs with relevant keywords/categories, and Configurable Work Speeds will automatically provide sliders for them in the mod options menu. See documentation for details.

ConfigurableWorkSpeeds_Extension.description: Other mods can extend this mod by adding StatDefs with work speed-related keywords/categories.
